description: Find posts that match multiple hashtags or locations on Instagram

outputDescription.likes: Number of likes the post received
outputDescription.views: Number of views, if the post contains a video
outputDescription.location: Where the photo was taken, if specified
outputDescription.matches: Which hashtags or location lead to this post
outputDescription.postVideo: Link to raw video file, can contains more than one link if the data is available
outputDescription.videoThumbnail: Link to raw video thumbnail, if available

search.label: Hashtags / locations list (?)
search.helper: You can also enter a public Google Spreadsheet URL or public CSV URL (each line containing multiple hashtags or locations in a single cell, separated by commas)

sessionCookie.label: Your Instagram session cookie (sessionid) (?)
sessionCookie.helper: Paste here your sessionid cookie value. How?

columnName.label: Spreadsheet column name for Instagram hashtags
columnName.helper: If you're using a spreadsheet/CSV, tell us in which column you put the hashtags & locations (otherwise we'll use the first column)

maxPosts.label: Number of posts to scrape per hashtag
maxPosts.helper: By default, the API will scrape 2000 posts per hashtag
